name: Hotel Noir 2023
description:
Detective! There's been a murder at my prestigious hotel! Please excuse the mess, I sent all the staff home after I heard about what happened. Your job is to explore the hotel and collect clues to find the culprit!

Controls
WASD or arrow keys to move.
Hold space to interact.

Producer
Preston C.

Programming/Game Design
Preston C.
Josh Vo.

Music/Sound
Nick U.
Josh Vi.

Art

Noelle D.
